item.title: Code
item.description: Some test'n fer different styles used 'n rules highlight'n an' preformatted blocks. Inline Code This be some very long inline code. Whar' does it wrap? What about wrapp'n short inline code if multiple sections be written side by side? What about wrapp'n short inline code if multiple sections be written side/by/side? What about wrapp'n long inline code if multiple sections be written side567 by34567 side567? What about wrapp'n long inline code if multiple sections be written side567/by34567/side567?
